column4: so check this out. about 2 weeks ago i decided to install ubuntu to move away from windows. so i installed edgy and everything went fairly well. except for the life of me i could not get my ati card to play nice. so just tonight i decided to install feisty, and now glxinfo tells me direct rendering is on, and glxgears isn't slow as a pig
yeah. i'm really happy. i'm going to go for beryl a little later tonight
